add-column: Adding new columns to an existing table
add-column-first: Adding a column at the very first position
add-column-middle: Inserting columns between existing ones (AFTER logic)
add-foreign-key: Creating foreign key relationships between tables
audit-log-table: Production audit log: ENUM expansion + type upgrades + index restructuring
combined-column-index: Simultaneous ADD COLUMN + ADD INDEX in single ALTER
drop-column-with-index: Dropping columns that have dependent indexes (ordering stress)
e-commerce-users: Production e-commerce: 14→17 cols with ENUM, timestamp, and index evolution
fk-cascade-change: Changing FK referential actions (CASCADE → SET NULL / RESTRICT)
fk-drop: Removing a foreign key constraint entirely
fk-multi-column: Adding a composite multi-column foreign key
fulltext-index: Adding a FULLTEXT index on text columns
implicit-btree: USING BTREE normalization — should produce NO changes
int-display-width: INT(11) vs INT normalization — should produce NO changes
modify-column: Changing column data types (e.g. varchar -> enum)
procedure-matrix: Updating Stored Procedure parameters and body
reorder-columns: Column reordering — should produce NO changes (name-based compare)
unique-to-normal: Downgrading UNIQUE KEY to normal KEY (DROP+ADD)
version-comments: MySQL version comments normalization — should produce NO changes
